line_1: You'll know better in time, Miss: — She was but fifteen:
line_2: Her mamma was confus'd — with a little chagrin,

line_1: Unless dress'd as young as if barely fifteen.
line_2: Or who in a circle is fit to be seen

line_1: I thout o' the days when I was but fifteen,
line_2: And skipp'd wi' the best upon Forbes's green.

line_1: To scribble as you scribble at fifteen;
line_2: And teach her unexperienc'd yet and green,

line_1: Since LYDIA knew the blossoms of fifteen;
line_2: NOW twenty springs had cloth'd the park with green,

line_1: Who rule the Sex to Fifty from Fifteen,
line_2: Then thus addrest the Pow'r — Hail wayward Queen;
